history.text: hello
Hi there
Have you seen The Post?
No i have not seen it yet how about you ?
Yes I have.  It's a pretty good movie.  It stars Meryl Streep and Tom Hanks.
Oh nice, whats the movie about ?
It's a historical drama set in 1970.  It the true story of how journalists at the Washington Post attempted to publish the Pentagon Papers.
Sounds like an interesting movie i might have to watch it soon
They were classified papers about the 30 years the U.S. was involved in Vietnam.
What were the ratings like ?
It has a cinemaScore of A.
Metacritic gave it 83 out of 100. and Rotten Tomatoes 7.9/10
Oh thats good that it got such good ratings .  You don's see many movies now days getting those type of ratings
No you don't.  Especially not for a historical drama.
What was your favorite scene from the movie ?
My favorite scene was when Ellsberg gets fed up, photo copies the papers, and leaks them to the New York Times.
It also has Sarah Paulson, Bob Odenkirk, and Tracy Letts.  It's pretty star packed.
Oh wow so many big names in this movie , i cant believe that i haven's seen it or heard of it
Is Tom hanks one of the main actors in the movie ?
Yes, he stars as Ben Bradlee.
Is the ending of the movie good ? Or is it a bad ending ?

Well I won't give it all away.  But they do decide to run the story which more than likely will get the newspaper charged with contempt but if they win The Post would become a journalistic institution.
oh okay very interesting .. thanks for not ruining it for me !
It's very dramatic.  But it tells the true story of The Post and Pentagon papers.
Sounds like a very good movie , im going to search hulu and netflix later tonight to see if i can maybe watch it on one of those services
No problem.  It even goes a little into the Watergate Scandal.
I forgot to mention that it's directed by Steven Spielberg.
Oh okay that explains the ratings ,  hes such a good director
So many good movies from him
Yes he's awesome.  It was written by Liz Hannah and Josh Singer.  You can't go wrong with Josh Singer.

uid1response.feedback: i will watch the movie based on the help from my partner

uid2response.feedback: The other user left the chat.
